meanings.sent1: She enjoys agatizing rocks to create beautiful agate pieces.
meanings.sent2: The geologist is agatizing the mineral samples for further study.
meanings.sent3: The artist joked that he was agatizing the paint to make it look like a precious stone.
meanings.sent4: Her skillful hands seemed to agatize the plain stone into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The process of agatizing turns ordinary rocks into stunning agate masterpieces.

meanings.definition: agatizing: the process of forming agate
meanings.sent1: The agatizing of the gemstone resulted in a beautiful agate formation.
meanings.sent2: During the agatizing, layers of minerals combine to create unique patterns.
meanings.sent3: The classroom demonstration on agatizing fascinated the students.
meanings.sent4: The slow agatizing of the liquid produced a mesmerizing agate swirl.
meanings.sent5: The agatizing process involves heat and pressure to form the intricate patterns of agate.

meanings.definition: agatizing: the act of creating agate patterns
meanings.sent1: Her agatizing of the jewelry pieces added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The agatizing of the glass beads gave them a unique marbled look.
meanings.sent3: The agatizing of the fabric resulted in a stunning pattern for the dress.
meanings.sent4: The agatizing of the clay produced intricate swirls and designs.
meanings.sent5: His agatizing technique allowed him to create beautiful and intricate agate patterns.
